<!--This file is autogenerated-->





# Functions
## deployAsset
```solidity
  function deployAsset(
            bytes32 _xbridgeId,
            string _name,
            string _symbol,
            uint8 _decimals
  ) external returns (address deTokenAddress)
```

Deploy a deToken(XDCBridgeTokenProxy) for an asset

### Parameters:
| Name | Type | Description                                                          |
| :--- | :--- | :------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|`_xbridgeId` | bytes32 | Asset id, see XDCBridgeGate.getXbridgeId
|`_name` | string | The asset's name
|`_symbol` | string | The asset's symbol
|`_decimals` | uint8 | The asset's decimals


# Events
## XDCBridgeTokenDeployed
```solidity
  event XDCBridgeTokenDeployed(
        address asset,
        string name,
        string symbol,
        uint8 decimals
  )
```

Emitted when a deToken(XDCBridgeTokenProxy) is deployed using this contract
